term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - sensitive volume of a radiation detector
term.title: sensitive volume

item.text: That volume of the detector where an incident radiant power produces a measurable output.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1745. 'Nomenclature, symbols, units and their usage in spectrochemical analysis-XI. Detection of radiation (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1751 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567101745)
